mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(tvs.patient_id,"") AS patient_id, date_format(tvs.data_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, date_format(tvs.data_time, '%H:%i') AS time, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='consciousness' THEN dcia.common_item_name END),"") AS consciousness, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='pupilLeft' THEN dcib.common_item_name END),"") AS pupilLeft, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='pupilRight' THEN dcic.common_item_name END),"") AS pupilRight, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='lightReflectionLeft' THEN dcid.common_item_name END),"") AS lightReflectionLeft, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='lightReflectionRight' THEN dcie.common_item_name END),"") AS lightReflectionRight, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='temperature' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS temperature, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='hr' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS hr, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='pulse' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS pulse, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='heartRate' THEN dcif.common_item_name END),"") AS heartRate, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='br' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS br, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='ibp' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS ibp, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='bp' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS bp, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='spo2' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS spo2, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='cvp' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS cvp, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='cvpmmHg' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS cvpmmHg, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='bloodSugar' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS bloodSugar, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='airWayStyle' THEN dcig.common_item_name END),"") AS airWayStyle, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='airbagPressure' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS airbagPressure, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='rsDepth' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS rsDepth, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='rsModel' THEN dcih.common_item_name END),"") AS rsModel, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='rsOxygen' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS rsOxygen, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='rsMoisture' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS rsMoisture, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='pc' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS pc, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='rsFrequency' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS rsFrequency, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='ps' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS ps, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='peep' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS peep, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='ipap' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS ipap, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='epap' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS epap, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='bpm' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS bpm, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='ie' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS ie, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='breathSoundLeft' THEN dcii.common_item_name END),"") AS breathSoundLeft, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='breathSoundRight' THEN dcij.common_item_name END),"") AS breathSoundRight, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='inhaleOxygenStyle' THEN dcik.common_item_name END),"") AS inhaleOxygenStyle, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='inhaleOxygenConcentration' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS inhaleOxygenConcentration, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='inhaleOxygenConcentration2' THEN tvs.content END),"") AS inhaleOxygenConcentration2, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN tvs.code='signature' THEN tu.user_name END),"") AS signature FROM table_vital_sign tvs LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcia ON dcia.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcia.type='consciousness' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcib ON dcib.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcib.type='pupil' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcic ON dcic.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcic.type='pupil' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcid ON dcid.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcid.type='light_reflection' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcie ON dcie.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcie.type='light_reflection' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcif ON dcif.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcif.type='heart_rate' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcig ON dcig.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcig.type='air_way' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcih ON dcih.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcih.type='rs_model' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcii ON dcii.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcii.type='breath_sound' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcij ON dcij.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcij.type='breath_sound' LEFT JOIN dict_common_item dcik ON dcik.common_item_code=tvs.content AND dcik.type='inhale_oxygen_style' LEFT JOIN table_user tu ON tu.login_name=tvs.content WHERE 1 = 1 AND tvs.status !=- 1 AND tvs.patient_id=#{patientId} AND date_format(tvs.data_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=#{dataTime} GROUP BY tvs.data_time

SELECT IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='temperature' THEN content END),"") AS temperature, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='hr' THEN content END),"") AS hr, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='SpO₂' THEN content END),"") AS 'SpO₂', IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='ibp' THEN content END),"") AS ibp, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='bp' THEN content END),"") AS bp, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='cvp' THEN content END),"") AS cvp, IFNULL(max(CASE WHEN code='cvpmmHg' THEN content END),"") AS cvpmmHg FROM table_vital_sign WHERE 1 = 1 AND status !=-1 AND status = #{status} AND patient_id = #{patientId} AND date_format(data_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='temperature' THEN content END),"") AS temperature, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='hr' THEN content END),"") AS hr, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='SpO₂' THEN content END),"") AS 'SpO₂', IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='ibp' THEN content END),"") AS ibp, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='bp' THEN content END),"") AS bp, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='cvp' THEN content END),"") AS cvp, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='cvpmmHg' THEN content END),"") AS cvpmmHg FROM table_vital_sign WHERE 1 = 1 AND status !=-1 AND status = #{status} AND patient_id = #{patientId} AND date_format(data_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='temperature' THEN content END),"") AS temperature, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='hr' THEN content END),"") AS hr, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='SpO₂' THEN content END),"") AS 'SpO₂', IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='ibp' THEN content END),"") AS ibp, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='bp' THEN content END),"") AS bp, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='cvp' THEN content END),"") AS cvp, IFNULL(min(CASE WHEN code='cvpmmHg' THEN content END),"") AS cvpmmHg FROM table_vital_sign WHERE 1 = 1 AND status !=-1 AND status = #{status} AND patient_id = #{patientId} AND date_format(data_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') = #{dataTime}
